description: The Legend of Zelda: Phantom Hourglass is the sea bound handheld sequel to the Wind Waker.
game: The Legend of Zelda - Phantom Hourglass

ph-v0.8.3-alphar2.description:
HOTFIX: fixed crash on getting small keys in own dungeon and prevented heart containers stealing your starting health #171


- fixed TotOK keys from vanilla locations not writing to keystorage
- added spirit gems and heart containers to monotone-incremental category
- prevented underflow from spirit gems
- fixed TotOK B13 chest not showing on tracker
- ToC 2nd key door now takes crystals into account logically
- post ghost ship location's exclusion status correctly depends on rescuing tetra rather than the cubus sisters

- added killing phantoms with nothing but boomerang to logic lol
- added long bridge cave interior location to freedle island cave on map tracker

hotfix cause files were weird #174

v0.1.1-demo.title: Zelda Phantom Hourglass: Demo bugfixes v0.1.1

v0.3.0-demo.description:
# New Content
- Randomized Molida Island
- Randomized Temple of Courage
- Randomized Spirit Island
- Randomized Frogs - with yaml options!
- Randomized Beedle
- Randomized Nyave
- Added 100 rupee dig spot on Cannon island

# Core Changes
- The flag system has been overhauled and is now over generalized and robust! This will make any flag stuff easy to implement.
- Added detection for what save file you're playing on, so it doesn't read savedata from the wrong file.

# Bugfixes
- Linebeck now releases you from TotOK
- Eddo's workshop now works correctly
- Guy with maize colored tunic on Mercay no longer randomly disappears
- Treasure maps dug from the ground or given by an npc now work with the treasure map in your inventory
- Fixed some faulty check hitboxes
- Traveling from sea to land now sets stage flags correctly
- Probably more but I haven't documented properly

# Known Issues
- Sword and items menu don't appear without a save and quit
- Saving and quitting in some rooms doesn't load it's checks properly, fixed by reentering the room
- Some checks can be lost forever and don't have their backup savedata reads yet. Most notably the big red rupee from the bonk tree on Cannon Island that can fall in the water.
- Reconnecting the bizhawk client in TotOK sometimes gives you more keys
- Courage Crest room on TotOK B6 needs more testing with different item and flag configurations.
- Although spirit island is in logic, Spirit gems are still marked as filler items and progression won't generate there. There are also barely enough spirit gems in the pool.
- There are check conflicts in a couple of rooms with items that can be moved with boomerang or grapple. Will work fine as long as they aren't moved

# Coming soon:
- Actual good documentation, FAQ and detailed crediting
- Treasure and rupee logic, and shop rando options. Potential shop rotating?
- 2nd half of TotOK
- NW quadrant (and the rest of the game eventually~)
- US version support???
- Hash verification for savefile to slot
- Resources for obscure tricks
v0.3.0-demo.title: Zelda Phantom Hourglass v0.3.0-demo

v0.4.0-demo.description:
## New Content

- Added 2nd half of TotOK
- Added Bellum and options for completion requirements
  - choose how many dungeons are requried
  - choose what happens when you get that requirement
	- Unlock the phantom door
	- Unlock Bellum's staircase
	- Spawn the blue warp to Bellum
	- Spawn Bellumbeck in the overworld
- Added Rare Metals as dungeon reward mcguffins
- Added Triforce Crest as an optional item, locking the second half of TotOK
- Added option for if sea travel requires the SW Sea Chart, and removes Linebeck if you don't have it.
  - If disabled, traveling without the chart is in logic. Beware of softlocks if you leave the quadrant.

## Bugfixes

- Item menu should now always appear on s+q, no matter how long you wait
- Added saveram reads for checks that have a high chance of being messed up. Like the big rupee on Cannon Island that likes to fall in the sea
- Savewarping in a dungeon now correctly loads locations in the starting room
- Fixed logic assuming bombchus worked in rooms without maps
- TotOK no longer duplicates keys on client restart
- Courage Crest room in TotOK B6 now functions in every case (i hope)
- There is now only 1 Linebeck on Mercay :(
v0.4.0-demo.title: Zelda Phantom Hourglass AP v0.4.0-demo

v0.5.0-alpha.description:
# Added the entire game.

* [Setup guide](https://github.com/carrotinator/Archipelago/blob/a7bff1f0d688dac7b889877acd37bd8b2d548a63/worlds/tloz_ph/docs/setup.md)
* [FAQ](https://github.com/carrotinator/Archipelago/blob/a7bff1f0d688dac7b889877acd37bd8b2d548a63/worlds/tloz_ph/docs/faq_and_credits.md)

## Major New Content since last demo:
- Added NW, SE and NE quadrants with all islands and dungeons.
- Added Rupee logic
- Added treasure, as sellable rupee items
- Removed ship parts entirely, and added entire ships to the pool instead. 
  - They auto-equip when you find them, and currently you can't change it!
  - I'll add ship customization based on this to the shipyard soon.- Added trade quest items
- Added ammo refills as filler items
- Added hints for what dungeons are required
- Allow non-required dungeons to be barren

## Minor New Content
- Added Masked Beedle
- Oshus now gives items
- Potions are handled correctly, but are not in the item pool. You can safely buy them from shops.
- Phantom chests in TotOK can be farmed for rupees
  - Phantom chests that give ship parts give treasure instead
- Minigames that reward treasure can be farmed for rupees
- Removed treasure maps, these will be added again with salvagesanity
- Started writing an faq in the docs folder of the world [here](https://github.com/carrotinator/Archipelago/blob/a7bff1f0d688dac7b889877acd37bd8b2d548a63/worlds/tloz_ph/docs/faq_and_credits.md)

## New Yaml Settings
- exclude non-required dungeons
- toggle ghost ship in dungeon pool
- toggle totok in dungeon pool (can't become barren though)
- randomize harrow island (and allow harrow to be a farmable source of rupees)
- randomize masked beedle (may require editing time of day)
- required dungeon hints
- shop hints
- spirit upgrade hints
- fog settings
  - no fog
  - vanilla for - fog disappears after saving tetra
  - open ghost ship - you can find the ghost ship without having the spirits

## Bugfixes
- Fixed bug where items gotten through memory reads removed the vanilla item from that location
- Fixed a bunch of logic issues in the second half of TotOK
- Killing the rat for a key in Mountain Passage with a pot from the previous floor is now in medium logic
- Fixed a bunch of inconsistent flags
- Fixed some saveram issues

## Known issues
- You need to save and quit for sword, regal necklace and item menu to function properly
- Exiting the fog towards the rest of the NW quadrant with spirits out and fog removed crashes. Entering the ghost ship removes the spirits and lets you leave safely. Travel through the fog without all spirits functions as normal.
- Reentering the spirit pool on Spirit Island can give you extra spirits

## Missing Locations
- Salvage and treasure maps don't exist (excluding courage crest)
- Fishing is not implemented
- Post is not implemented. You will never get mail.
- Potions are not implemented in pool, but you can buy them from shops
- Jolene does not exist
- Zauz gives the phantom blade check immedietly. Eventually I'll make him give it based on having a certain amount of rare metals, similar to the old man in oracle of seasons
- The girl on Molida island does not give a treasure map
- Oshus' Spirit gem is a bit inconsistent, but should trigger after Temple of Wind
- Only sensitive locations have backup savefile reads in case they trigger incorrectly or you get them while the client is disconnected.
v0.5.0-alpha.title: The Legend of Zelda: Phantom Hourglass AP v0.5.0-alpha

v0.5.1-alpha.description:
## Bug fixes
- Fixed compatibility issues if running from source with python 3.11
- Fixed some generation issues
  - Capping required dungeons now works properly
  - Locking keys in excluded dungeons no locker happens if non-required dungeons are not excluded
  - The triforce door goal was not in logic. Oops
v0.5.1-alpha.title: Zelda Phantom Hourglass AP v0.5.1-alpha

v0.5.2-alpha.description:
## Logic Issues
- Maze island logic is now sequential
- Killing eye brutes with nothing is in hard logic
- Zauz' Triforce crest item is now correctly in post dungeon pool
- Oshus' item after temple of wind is now available with phantom blade too, since i can't seem to separate them.

## Flag Issues
- Goron elder check after temple should now work correctly
- Oshus' check after wind temple should now work correctly
- Courage Crest Check should now work correctly
- Zauz' Triforce chart should now work correctly
- Spirit island hints now trigger inside
- Doyland now works even if you didn't already have the king's key
- Pirate Ambush ship should not spawn too early
- Ice plateau's state no longer depends on the Azurine item
- Prince of red Lions gives his item at the appropriate time

## UT
- UT shows excluded locations correctly
- UT now shows checks in logic requiring boss keys, force gems and crystals if you can get their chests
- UT now shows checks in logic requiring small keys if they are in their vanilla locations, or in their own dungeons if you have all possible locations in logic

## Other
- Added location Isle of Ruins Bonk Tree
- Added an anti-softlock to Mountain Passage
- Fixed hitbox for mountain passage key drop
- Removed sram reads from treasure maps, since they respawn and don't individually save to sram
- Client will now remove progressive items from source properly
- The client sends less spam to the server
- Renamed Medium logic to hard logic
- Tried renaming some items to put them next to each other in UT. Might revert
- Updated the FAQ
v0.5.2-alpha.title: tloz_ph v0.5.2-alpha

v0.5.3-alpha-untested.description:
Early untested release to hotfix critical client crash

## Glitches added to logic
- Ember grapple chest without grapple
- Ice temple BCL
- Mercay passage without sword
- ToC grapple chest with boomerang
- Mercay out of bounds with swordsman's scroll

## New Check
- Dee Ess Island Blow on Mic Chest

## Bugfixes
- Checks should no longer be sent on savewarps
- Goron island north spike chest is now correctly in logic
- Fixed critical client crash on oshus
- Boss rewards are now filtered out from non-local items
- sending extra swords should now correctly give sword

## Remaining issues
- Ghost ship doesn't respawn properly sometimes
- sword sometimes goes missing

## Needs further testing
- Hammer skew in mutohs?
- Open ghost ship not respawning
- Ice plateau with azurine
- Oshus checks
v0.5.3-alpha-untested.title: tloz_ph v0.5.3-alpha-untested

v0.5.4-alpha.description:
## Bugfixes
- Fixed critical error of client crashing on receiving more than 256 items
- Oshus no longer gives a free phantom sword
- Linebeck no longer disappears after getting Oshus phantom sword check
- Zauz now gives item even if you've already spoken to Oshus
- Pirate ambush should spawn more consistently
- Ice fields should now work if you have already have Azurine
- Spirit island should no longer give free spirits
- Goron Island Yellow Chu item no longer thinks boomerang deals damage
- Locations given by memory reads that trigger before receiving their vanilla item no longer remove their vanilla item before receiving it
  - This includes dungeon fairies and sand, shop items and minigame rewards
- Fixed checks located close together giving each other's items
- Nyave no longer gives a free kaleidoscope
- Killing miblins on Nyave's ship with barrels added to hard logic

## New Checks
- Molida Cuccoo Grapple Small Island Dig
- Cannon Island Bee Dig
- Cannon Island SE Dig
- Maze Island NW Dig
- Maze Island NE Dig
- Maze Island SE Dig

## Renamed Checks
- Dee Ess Start button dig to Dee Ess Menu Button Dig
- Cannon Island Dig to Cannon Island East Dig
- Molida Island Cuccoo Dig to Molida Island Cuccoo Grapple Tree Dig
- Mercay Oshus Force Gem to Mercay Oshus Spirit Gem
v0.5.4-alpha.title: tloz_ph v0.5.4-alpha

v0.6.0-alpha.description:
- [Setup Guide](https://github.com/carrotinator/Archipelago/blob/main/worlds/tloz_ph/docs/setup.md)
- [FAQ and Credits](https://github.com/carrotinator/Archipelago/blob/main/worlds/tloz_ph/docs/faq_and_credits.md)
- [Tricks and Skips](https://github.com/carrotinator/Archipelago/blob/main/worlds/tloz_ph/docs/tricks_and_skips.md)

⚠️Not compatible with any previous version⚠️

## Major new features 🐟
- Added Salvage and Treasure Maps
- Added Fishing
- Added McGuffin Hunt goal option.
- Added Death Link. Works for Link, the ship and during salvage.
- Added Warp to Start. Open the collection screen, and click the swap screen button to trigger it. Then enter any scene transistion. There are messages in the client to let you know if it's working.
- Added Time Logic to Temple of the Ocean King, with lots of yaml options
- Added Beedle cards and Beedle membership locations with options and Beedle point items
- Added Custom Metal items
- Zauz phantom blade check triggers off metal count, like the old man in Oracle Seasons.
 
## Minor new features 💎
- Added option for randomizing rupee dig spots
- Added option for randomizing minigames, with hint option
- Added option to skip ocean fights
- Added spirit gem packs with options
- Added Jolene's letter and Joanne check
- Added prize postcards and extra Man of Smiles location
- Added salvage repair kits that auto repair if you hit one health, and give a free repair at other locations.
- Added Full Heal item
- Added Phantom Hourglass item

## Notable Bugfixes 🐛
- Fixed dungeons giving away free sand of hours and spirits
- Rewrote the loading detection code
- Fixed some item giving/removing edgecases
- Fixed some huge issues surronding locations from address reads
- Fixed vanilla spirits stealing other spirits
- Vanilla heart container locations no longer steal heart containers at max health
- Added safety flag sets for common errors
- Added emergency sword disappeared detector + debug info logger and made it spamm a bunch to make sure it's noticed
- Let delay pickup deal with rupee amounts, fixes location conflicts on ghost ship third sister chests and ice plateau south ledge chests
- Increased bizhawk timeout rate to 0.15 to catch the 11 frame loads between quick lodaing island scenes like Goron Island and Isle of Ruins
- Heart containers now full heal you
- Removed all mail from starting flags
- TotOK B7 peg switch chest now has the correct vanilla item
- Fixed phantoms not spawning on B13
- Isle of frost Elder Dig now has the correct vanilla item
- Fixed Mutoh's gate being open by default
- Fixed Doylan item after Mutoh's temple
- Added sram reads to maze island digs

## Logic fixes and renamings ♟

- Lowered the logically required rupees for non-linear shops to 70% if shop hints are enabled
- Moved Molida archery 2000 to hard logic +
- Attacking as gongoron now logically requires sword
- Goron Chief post dungeon item now requires doing the quiz
- Hitting the boomerang switches on Ice Temple 3f with bow now expects you to pick up the key too
- Fixed issue when combinding Ice Temple B1 BCL with shooting the boomerang switches with bow
- Mutoh's Temple now requires boomerang or Spirit of Courage level 1 if not in glitched logic
- Added hammer skew + Spirit of Courage level 1 as a glitched logic way to skip bow in Mutoh's Temple
- Renamed treasure maps to include salvage location
- Renamed TotOK Wizzrobe checks
- Doyland's checks renamed to Doylan

## Universal Tracker Additions 🗺️
- Added UT Glitched Logic Support
- Added UT support for generating without yaml

## Other QoL etc ✨
- Synced with AP-main 0.6.2
- Added more item + location groups
- Full health + ammo refills on entering Mercay Pub
- Ship Customization in the shipyard now functions again, and entering the shipyard prevents future ship finds from auto equipping. You have all the parts for all the ships you've found.
- Oshus tells you how many metals you have/are missing/in pool.
- Zauz tells you how many metals he wants and world total
- Fuzo (on cannon island) and Beedle will repair your salvage arm for a cost if it's at 2 health or below
- Added full heal to Bellumbeck
- Made item and location ids consistent for all future versions
- Player is banned from Harrow if it's not randomized
- Reapling spawns on Ghost Ship b3 if hard logic +
- Removed mountain passage anti-softlock now that warp to start exists
v0.6.0-alpha.title: tloz_ph AP v0.6.0-alpha

v0.6.1-alpha.description:
## Bugfixes 🦟
- Fixed Critical Client crash on finishing Temple of Courage
- Fixed Critical error of game sometimes deleting all your items and flags
- Swapped reads for treasure maps 24 and 26 and their corresponding locations
- Fixed vanilla rupee locations stealing rupees near 9999
v0.6.1-alpha.title: tloz_ph AP v0.6.1-alpha

v0.6.2-alpha.description:
## ⚠️Critical Bugfix⚠️

- Fixed 1/9 chance of game deleting all items on a save and quit
- Added webworld support

If one of your saves had their items deleted by this bug, here's the fix:
Open RAM watch, create a new watch for `1BA64C` with a size of `2 bytes`, and set it to zero. This tells the client that you haven't gotten any items, and it will sync you with the apworld by sending all your items again. This still won't update any flags you've set in game, but most of the client reads trigger off server info so some things will be okay.
v0.6.2-alpha.title: tloz_ph AP v0.6.2-alpha

v0.6.3-alpha.description:
## New Features
- After reaching the midway in TotOK, future TotOK small keys found will also be given on taking the midway
- Add client printouts for items received while not in game
- Updated some docs

## Bugfixes
- Wow found the sword stealing bug. The safety to make sure the client wasn't writing a bigger value than 255 to a byte was setting the max to 254, for which the items byte would remove the sword on getting the final item. You had to have bought shield for it to happen, which i never do, hence why it never happened to me!
- Linebecks spawning on Mercay Island should now be consistent
- Swapped logic for TotOK B3 sw and se chests cause they were swapped
- Item menu now shows up on getting your first item, thanks to @CelestialKitsune
- Renamed Ojibe cause he has a name
- Courage Crest room should now let you out easier

## Memorial
- Removed Boomerwatch. Thank you for your service, you will be missed.

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/carrotinator/Archipelago/compare/v0.6.2-alpha...v0.6.3-alpha
v0.6.3-alpha.title: tloz_ph AP v0.6.3-alpha

v0.6.4-alpha.description:
## Bugfixes
- You no longer need to save and quit for the sword model to load/unload!!! Thank you @CelestialKitsune !!!
- Getting small keys for TotOK after reaching the midway no longer crashes
- Getting a refill item after receiving more than the max of their corresponding progressive item no longer crashes, thanks to @CelestialKitsune
- If you have a sword before getting the sword chest, it no longer tries to steal your sword
- Fixed Mercay Clear rocks hitbox if you get the item by ignoring him
- Fixed 2/9 chance of Mercay stage flags not loading properly after intro cs
- Oshus spirit gem check should correctly trigger off wind temple alone
- Loading a save file with more items than the multiworld now fixes itself and gives a warning message.

## Hotfixed changes after initial release #15 
- Fixed compatibility issue with seeds generated in v0.6.x-alpha
- Fixed crash on loading the wrong save file

## Secret background stuff
- Entrance rando is secretly working, but missing logic, data, and full support for continuous entrances.
v0.6.4-alpha.title: tloz_ph AP v0.6.4-alpha

v0.6.5-alpha.description:
## Bugfixes
- Fixed rupee crash ugh

## Hotfix
- Fixed client crash on getting vanilla progressive item #19 

## Features
- Changed logic for Oshus Phantom Sword to include both blade and hourglass
  - If you use this on a seed generated on another version, Oshus may not give you their item in when you're logically suppose to.
- Synced with upstream AP 0.6.3

## Secret ER Progress
- Added support for continuous transitions
- Ember Island has turned into hell.
v0.6.5-alpha.title: tloz_ph AP v0.6.5-alpha

v0.6.6-alpha.description:
Still compatible with any seeds generated in v0.6.x

!! HOTFIX !! #22 
if you downloaded on release, there may be a bug where doors don't open. This has been fixed, and you can redownload it from this release

## New Features
- Added simple map tracker to UT, thanks to @palex00
- Added Deprioritized itemclassification
  - Progression Deprioritized: Hearts, Sand, Spirit Gem Packs, Treasure Maps
  - Progression Deprioritized Skip Balancing: Rupees, Treasure, Spirit Gems
- Change logic for Oshus Gem with blade to hourglass + blade
- Added option groupings for the auto-generated yaml

## Experimental Teasers
- Dungeon Entrance Shuffle
  - Does not include Ghost Ship
  - Compatible with UT
  - Blue warps after bosses take you to the inside entrance of their dungeon
- Dungeon Shortcuts
  - The house closest to the port on islands with dungeons will act as a shortcut to said dungeon after getting the first location there.
  - Not (yet) compatible with dungeon shuffle

## Backend Changes
- Separated out dynamic flag conditions to own method
- Added reset conditions to dynamic flags so they are compatible with entrance rando
- Added dynamic entrance system
- Some changes to logic syntax
v0.6.6-alpha.title: tloz_ph AP v0.6.6-alpha

v0.6.7-alpha.description:
## Bugfixes
- Having more than 20 spirit gems no longer breaks isle of spirits, thanks to @Tanker50207
- Generation should no longer crash in AP < 0.6.3 due to deprioritized items
- Goron island will no longer stop working with Crimzonine
- Dee Ess goron race should no longer be available early and softlock you if you play it while not having a shovel
- Dungeon shortcuts now read slot data correctly
- Uncharted island gossip stone puzzle should now work every time
- Fixed faulty logic in Mutoh's temple

## Behind the scene changes
- A DSZeldaClient class has been separated out, for both ph and st to inherit from. It's still in early stages, and needs a lot of cleanup
- Client runs at a slower tick speed when not in game
- Started using [github projects](https://github.com/users/carrotinator/projects/1/views/2) to track bugs and features

## New Contributors
* @Tanker50207 made their first contribution in https://github.com/carrotinator/Archipelago/pull/56
v0.6.7-alpha.title: tloz_ph AP v0.6.7-alpha

v0.6.8-alpha.description:
## Bugfixes
- Fixed critical crash on getting TotOK small keys in TotOK
- Goron Island Chu Item no longer sends automatically if you already have the map
- Blue warp after Dongorongo with dungeon shuffle no longer takes you outside the wrong dungeon
- Blue warp after Temple of Courage with dungeon shuffle no longer takes you outside the wrong dungeon
- Dungeon Completion no longer sends a deathlink

## Other
- Text speed is now automatically set to fast
- DSZeldaClient is complete, and has been integrated with the spirit tracks AP! Our shared code will now stay up to date!
v0.6.8-alpha.title: tloz_ph AP v0.6.8-alpha

v0.6.9-alpha.description:
## Features
- UT Deferred Entrance Support. UT will detect what randomized entrances you've visited, and not show logic for what you don't know. Unexplored randomized entrances show up in the tracker.

## Bugfixes
- Fixed Dongorongo not spawning
- Fixed Ice temple midboss not spawning
- Fixed ocean logic
  - support for ER stuff
  - frog warping has never been in logic due to a typo!!
- Fixed post dungeon locations not accounting for dungeon shuffle
- Goal locations always contain nothing, since they can never be collected.
- Spirit gem packs are now also capped on Spirit Island
- Phantom Hourglass is now always progression due to Oshus Check
- Removed sheath visual after opening Oshus' Chest
- Fixed conflict with Bizhawk_UT client

## Experimental
- Added new experimental yaml setting: shuffle_island_entrances.
- Boat requires sea chart is supported for all islands
- Completed ER logic and support for all of Isle of Ruins, with all the water mechanics. No way to play that in the current version though!
- Rewrote most of the ER code
v0.6.9-alpha.title: tloz_ph AP v0.6.9-alpha

v0.7.0-alpha.description:
# New Features
- Full Overworld Entrance Randomization
  - Houses
  - Caves
  - Dungeons
    - Now includes Ghost Ship!
  - Overworld Transitions
- Boss Shuffle
- Boss Key Randomization
- Added `Isle of Frost Stand on Peg Gift` and `Isle of Ruins NW Lower Water Bonk Tree` locations
- Added missing locations to UT Map tracker

ER is complicated, so i did some documentation and added a flowcharting template for keeping track of the messier settings: https://github.com/carrotinator/Archipelago/wiki/Entrance-Rando

# New Settings
ER Settings are inspired by the LADX Beta's mixed pool option. This lets you create cool custom settings, like dungeon chains, without dedicated options!
- ER Settings:
  - shuffle_houses
  - shuffle_caves
  - shuffle_overworld_transitions
  - shuffle_bosses
  - entrance_directionality (preserve/disregard entrance directions)
  - decouple_entrances
  - shuffle_between_islands
- boss key settings:
  - randomize_boss_keys
  - boss_key_behavior
- dungeon hint rework:
  - dungeon_hint_type
  - dungeon_hint_location
  - excluded_dungeon_hints
- require_specific_bosses

# Bugfixes
- Added a backup fix for Oshus disappearing and not giving his checks.
- Removed duplicate Linebeck on Isle of Ember
- Fixed bug where the game regave all items after client disconnect
- Dying while at sea with port ER respawns you at the correct port
- Isle of Frost Ice field no longer breaks after defeating Gleeok
- Added temple of fire 3F switches without boomerang to logic
- Fixed some other misc logic issues
- Man of Smiles now removes the correct vanilla treasure map
- Molida archery 2000 is no longer in logic when minigames are diabled in hard logic
- Gems on Isle of Spirits should now work correctly
- Yooks now have better and possible logic requirements
- Nyave Trade quest no longer triggers early
- Fixed the overlapping chest hitboxes on Isle of Frost Ice Field
- Added backup for Regal Necklace not being removed properly on IotD

# Known issues
- Jumping into loading zones usually failes ER
- Dig holes don't update properly in UT
- Saving and quitting in Temple of Ice closes a key door, i think this might somehow be vanilla behavior...
- Dongo, Gleeok and Eox still send death links on watching their completion cutscenes
- Jolene spawns when exiting ghost ship (shares a flag with one of the ones that prevents the fog crash)
- There are still cases where the courage crest room won't let you leave
- sometimes Linebeck will make you blow the dust of the NW sea chart
- entering a waterlogged transition can teleport you uncontrollably when bouncing you back, and can let you reach places out of logic.
- Generation fails with certain combinations of complicated ER options. I'll document this more later

# Backlogged features
- ER-related:
  - Internal Dungeon ER
  - Traveling ship ER
  - TotOK dungeon shortcuts
  - Switch state logic ugh
  - Ocean Transition ER
  - Mercay OOB ER
  - Entrance Plando
- Short cutscene skipping
- Syncing DSZeldaClient with ST again...
v0.7.0-alpha.title: tloz_ph AP v0.7.0-alpha

v0.7.1-alpha.description:
Compatible with seeds generated in v0.7.x

- Exiting the ghost ship with dungeon randomizer no longer fails if your last entered traveling ship was in the wrong quadrant
- Temple of Ice no longer expects you to find 3 keys before the first key door on normal/hard logic.
- Added new `additional_metal_names option`, `custom_prefer_vanilla`
- Fixed generation error concerning dig holes
- fixed some typos in the yaml
v0.7.1-alpha.title: tloz_ph AP v0.7.1-alpha

v0.7.2-alpha.description:
Compatible with seeds generated in any 0.7.x. If your dungeon got locked due to the bug, this won't fix it

- Fixed getting abstract boss key items opening/closing other doors on their floor.
	- ToI B1 key door locked itself after getting the boss key
	- ToF 3F arena door closed after beating arena
v0.7.2-alpha.title: tloz_ph AP v0.7.2-alpha

v0.7.3-alpha.description:
Compatible with seeds generated in any 0.7.x. 

- Mercay port can now be in logic with island shuffle without the SW sea chart
- dig hole entrances are now correctly tracked in UT
- fixed infinite gen for more than 33 metals and custom metal names
- Fixed ghost ship not working properly with open ghost ship
- boss cutscenes from act 2 bosses should no longer send deathlinks
- death linking during the spirit upgrade cutscene no longer crashes
- Synchronized with AP Main 0.6.5
- added manifest file
v0.7.3-alpha.title: tloz_ph AP v0.7.3-alpha

v0.7.4-alpha.description:
## New Features
- added entrance plando, a list of valid entrance names can be found [here](<https://github.com/carrotinator/Archipelago/wiki/Entrance-Plando>)
- added new option `add_item_to_pool`, useful for adding duplicate items

## Fixes
- Linebeck in TotOK no longer gives extra keys and prevents you from leaving on subsequent trips
- Astrid no longer gives her item early
- Treasure maps have been re-removed from pool if not playing with randomized salvage
- fixed `remove_item_from_pool` so that it works with any item
- Brant's Maze shortcut is always active for now. Will make it an option when i add more similar shortcuts
- Probably fixed logic error in Temple of Courage
- setting `dungeon_hint_location` to `start` now actually works
- picking up boss keys with vanilla behaviour no longer crashes
- added flag backups for blaaz and crayk in case they don't spawn due to flag stuff

Apparently i forgot to disable dev prints during generation, so it might spam the gen window a bit :3
v0.7.4-alpha.title: tloz_ph AP v0.7.4-alpha

v0.7.5-alphar2.description:
⚠️hotfix: fixed crash in ghost ship, redownload from here (it's a one line fix)⚠️

## New Options/Features
- added an option of `shuffle_on_own_island` to caves, houses and overworld transitions that overrides the big `shuffle_between_islands` option
- Getting sand upgrades in TotOK will now increment your sand count immediately. Currently it can go above your max, i might change that later
- added TotOK checkpoints. Each time you pass a blue warp, the yellow warp in the lobby will take you to the deepest one. Taking that warp back will take you to the next one up. This is only available with a hidden boolean option `totok_checkpoints` cause i can't figure out how to enable the phantom hourglass. You get infinite time after using a checkpoint.

## UT QoL
- Added Mountain Passage Rat to UT logic again
- added yellow text in UT for not opening the first key door in TotOK
- added yellow text in UT for using shops without rupees
- added yellow text in UT for savescumming keys in mutoh's temple
- changed mountain passage locations to yellow in UT until you have enough keys, in case of keylocking
- UT will exclude mountain passage key locations once you know all remaining locations are keys
- UT will exclude TotOK B3 Force gem locations after you find the grappling hook

## Flag Stuff
- Fixed some dynamic flag typos
- Frost stand on peg location will now trigger even if you have the Azurine
- fixed astrid after fire temple location
- fixed skippyjack protection not resetting properly

## Other Bugfixes
- jumping into loading zones no longer fails ER
- disconnecting in TotOK no longer gives free keys
- Added safety warp to the courage crest room in case celia won't let you out
v0.7.5-alphar2.title: tloz_ph AP v0.7.5-alpha

v0.7.6-alpha.description:
## New Features
- Added out of bounds entrances of Mercay to ER in glitched logic
- Added pedestal item randomization. Includes Shape Crystals and Force Gems
  - has 3 item options
    - `open_per_dungeon`: each crystal opens all pedestals of that type in their dungeon. 3 Force gem items per floor
    - `unique_pedestal`: activating each unique pedestal is an item
    - `open_globally`: one of each pedestal item type for all of that pedestal. 1 singular Force Gems item
  - has regular keysanity location options.
- added elevator functionality to the SE sea chart room, now you exit out the place you didn't come from

## Bugfixes
- fixed crash on ghost ship due to shared client update
- fixed crash on starting a game with ER due to shared client update
- UT stops showing savescummed key logic in TotOK after opening the permanent key door on 1F
- fixed bellum blockage removing itself prematurely
- spawning the Ghost Ship B3 reapling by default now actually happens in hard logic+, instead of in anything but hard logic
- fixed a logic issue in mountain passage with keysanity
- Temple of wind is no longer a valid path to the Oshus gem location if ToW is an excluded dungeon
- Beedle is now in logic from any ocean
- fixed UT crash if two ER paths link the exact 2 logic regions
- Isle of Ruins NW cave now actually cares about the water level

## Other
- Cleaned up ITEM_GROUPS
v0.7.6-alpha.title: tloz_ph AP v0.7.6-alpha

v0.8.0-alpha.description:
🚨not compatible with seeds generated on previous version🚨

- [Setup Guide](https://github.com/carrotinator/Archipelago/blob/main/worlds/tloz_ph/docs/setup.md)
- [FAQ and Credits](https://github.com/carrotinator/Archipelago/blob/main/worlds/tloz_ph/docs/faq_and_credits.md)
- [Tricks and Skips](https://github.com/carrotinator/Archipelago/blob/main/worlds/tloz_ph/docs/tricks_and_skips.md)

## UT-stuff 🗺️
This version requires Universal Tracker version [v0.2.25](https://github.com/FarisTheAncient/Archipelago/releases/tag/Tracker_v0.2.25) or later. You can find legacy setup instructions for v0.2.24 [here](https://github.com/carrotinator/Archipelago/wiki/UT-Map-Tracker)

- @palex00, @catzador and I made a full map tracker with entrance rando support! 
- made region names human friendly for use in `/get_logical_path`
- Added events for progression triggers distant from their effect to UT
- Added UT support for showing/hiding specific locations and entrances on specific maps based on what entrances are randomized.
- Added ut-only aliases for common regions, and made every entrance name into a region alias
- Added a yaml option for UT events
- Added a yaml option for how to handle blocked entrances in UT
  - mark on check
  - mark on traverse
  - unmark on open
- Added a yaml toggle for smart key logic in UT
- Changed GOAL locations to events.
- added support for `enforce_deferred_connections = off`
- added more internal events for better `/get_logical_path` shortcuts
- added toggle in `host.yaml` for `/get_logical_path` using unlocked shortcuts and map warps

## New Features 🌠

- Added map warping, with options. Open the sea chart and tap a previously visited island to warp to it's port on the next transition. There's an option for each warp location to also require an item.
- Excluded dungeons now actually shuffle their key items
- Added potions to item pool
- Treasure prices are now calculated accurately
- Hints now include entrance information
- Added aliases for a bunch of items.

## Smaller Changes & Fixes

### Logic 🧮
- fixed maze island beginner not needing sword
- added ToI 3F switch state chest to hard logic with only boomerang, found by minimini352 in the ph discord
- added logic for passing the stalfos in Ruins NE
- added getting the first chest in GT with only shovel to logic
- Updated logic for sea monster outside of bannan
- added gust cliff chest with grapple to logic
- no longer assumes you can farm rupees from archery game before finding the room
- fixed more mountain passage logic...
- made totok square pedestals progression items so that they can open stuff backwards
- added entering totok b9 through the nw corner with pedestal rando to logic
- fixed logic region stuff for ghost ship warp	
- added savewarping to the start of bomb flower cave to hard logic
- added savewarping to the start of mountain passage from all regions to hard logic

### Flags 🚩
- fixed totok B13 phantoms spawning early
- Bannan trade quest chest will spawn after trading the wood heart even if you haven't visited bannan island
- fixed some oshus phantom sword flags
- fixed frog flags on uncharted island
- fixed spirit gem capping conflating wisdom and courage gems
- quitting out of cubus sisters will no longer spawn post *unless* you spawn in a scene with a postbox, in which case it will disappear after reloading the room

### Generation 🌿
- Dee Ess West speaker SSW dig exists again, and has the correct rupee amount
- Archery Minigame 2000 is only active in hard logic, and is actually obtainable
- forced mountain passage keys in a solvable state if accessibility is full
- no longer creates duplicate pedestal items for excluded dungeons if crystals are anywhere
- fixed some holes in excluded boss handling
- decoupled bosses will no longer share exclusion status with their assumed single linked dungeon
- backup filler pool creation is more precise
- made se ocean glyphs progression so that you can be expected to warp there

### Client 📺
- boss warp redirection no longer breaks when dungeons are shuffled in mixed pool and bosses are vanilla
- Warp to start works with save and quit. 
- Saving and quitting out of boss rooms no longer spawns you out of logic
- triforce goal now sends correctly
- TotOK midway warp keeps giving keys after the first warp
- salvage instant-repairs actually work
- Fixed ghost ship b2 third sister chests
- added height clearance to location detection in case you grab a location at the start of a roll
- fixed deathlink being sent on starting final boss
- fixed triangle pedestal totok B8 not working
- fixed ghost ship crashing when trying to set it's warp

### Entrance Rando 🚪
- prevented entrance shuffling to the same room if an entrance is a type that doesn't like that (port or ow)
- Fixed ruins water logic only working in one direction, causing impossible seeds
- dungeon logic is now okay if you enter through the boss door. Backwards dungeon logic has yet to be implemented though.
- fixed a bunch of bugs with decoupled entrances logic
- figured out deep mp cave_shuffle key logic bug
- fixed gen fail with shuffled cubus sisters boss
- retrying er when failing no longer creates duplicate entrance objects (decoupled still does...)
- mercay shipyard chest is no longer excluded by blaaz if houses are shuffled
- prevented gen error for decoupled ruins manual placement

### Other Changes 🎁
- Made entrance and location names more consistent
- beedle points are now incremental
- buying your beedle points out of logic now shows up as yellow in UT
- Warp to start now refills ammo and heals you
- added better feedback for farmable locations
- added excluded dungeons, and more precise er conditions to spoiler log
- added warning for item pool running out of filler items during item_dict phase
- added cancel condition for warp to start from home scene
v0.8.0-alpha.title: tloz_ph AP v0.8.0-alpha

v0.8.1-alphar2.description:
Compatible with any 0.8.x gens

### HOTFIX: #162 
- Fixed client crash on getting NW sea chart with `boat requires sea chart` + `ut disconnect entrances on unlock` settings.
### HOTFIX 2: #163 
- fixed client crash on shooting frogs
- entrance hints for cyclok are now accurate


## Changelog:
- did some major refactoring, puts us a lot closer to multi-version support
- fixed crash on receiving deathlink
- fixed decoupled entrance for cubus sisters warp being in logic
- fixed totok locs not showing up on island tracker
- removed excluded boss event removal, would like to tie it to UT's hide_excluded option
- improved er timing for certain types of entrances
- added Mutoh's bk chest and ToI keydoors with 1 key to UT glitched logic
- attempted to fix reverse entrance_id = None bug
- Force Gems are no longer both item and itemgroup
- prevented salvage from doing bad map tabbing
v0.8.1-alphar2.title: tloz_ph AP v0.8.1-alpha
